title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 02/23/2019
itunes:title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 02/23/2019
description:
Colin talks with TCM Host and film expert Ben Mankiewicz about the Oscars including a snub for best picture even before they announce a winner.  Ben also talks about the lack of host for the awards and the impact streaming services have had on the film industry 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
